price: Nítorí náà, Allāhu gbá a mú pẹ̀lú ìyà ìkẹ́yìn àti àkọ́kọ́ (nípa ọ̀rọ̀ ẹnu rẹ̀ ìkẹ́yìn yìí àti àkọ́kọ́).¹
footnotes: 1. Ọ̀rọ̀ àkọ́kọ́ náà nìyí, Fir‘aon wí pé: “Ẹ̀yin ìjòyè, èmi kò mọ̀ pé ọlọ́hun kan tún wà lẹ́yìn mi!” Sūrah al-Ƙọsọs; 28:38

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
